Ã‚Â»Description:

Welcome to Kirata - Lost among the peaks of the Himalayas country with a rich tradition, the world is threatened by a despotic ruler. Your hero, Ajay Gail came here to fulfill the last wishes of his mother, but became embroiled in a civil war: the locals are trying to overthrow the impostor Pagan Mina. Embark on a journey through the open world, but beware: in an unfamiliar country with you anything can happen.
